1.title: Back to the Digital World! Hot Time in Dragon Land
1.plot: Mikey and Shoutmon return to the Digital World but discover it has been completely taken over by the evil Bagra Empire and divided into seven lands, ruled by seven Dark Generals who all have the power to Digi-fuse.

2.title: Take a Stand Christopher! Fusion Fighters Rescue Mission
2.plot: Christopher and Metal Greymon's strength is put to the test when they join Mikey and Shoutmon on a rescue mission to save the rest of the Fusion Fighters from being deleted at the hands of the Dark General Dorbickmon.

3.title: Vampire Land and the Moonlight General!
3.plot: Now a united group, teams Blue Flare and the Fusion Fighters head to Vampire Land, where they discover a group of helpless Digimon being kidnapped by the fearsome vampire Dark General NeoMyotismon.

4.title: Hang on, Greymon! The Rise of Shoutmon DX
4.plot: When Metal Greymon is absorbed by NeoMyotismon, Mikey and Shoutmon search for the legendary White Lopmon, who may be the key to defeating NeoMyotismon and freeing their friend.

5.title: The Power Drain: The Hunters of Honeyland
5.plot: The Fusion Fighters travel to Honeyland, where innocent Digimon are being drained of their energy in order to make digi-honey. They also meet a potential new ally named Mervamon, but her extremely narrow-minded focus on defeating the Dark General and inability to work with the team alienates several of the Fusion Fighters.

6.title: Sweet Revenge: The Horrors of Honeyland!
6.plot: Zamielmon, the Dark General of Honeyland, invites Mikey and the Fusion Fighters to a day of horrors in his own personal theme park. Can they survive the 'fun' long enough to defeat him?

7.title: Ewan and the Land of Illusion
7.plot: Nene's search for her little brother Ewan finally comes to an end, but she is devastated to discover that Ewan is a General for Lord Bagra and her brother thinks the Digital World and Digi-Fusion is just a glorified game with no consequences.

8.title: Psyche-Out in Cyberland!
8.plot: As the team enters Cyber Land, they discover a friendly little girl named Luca who is only too eager to join their team. Only Dorulumon is suspicious of her intentions, but can he prove that Luca is up to no good?

9.title: The Water Tiger's Slippery Trap
9.plot: The evil shape-shifting Dark General of Cyber Land continues his work to divide and conquer Mikey, Shoutmon and their friends with a series of impersonations and traps. Can they see through the ruse and work together to stop him?

10.title: Gold Land and the Irate Pirate!
10.plot: Mikey and the Fusion Fighters must fight for their friends when the Dark General of Gold Land casts a spell on Shoutmon and several of the team members, forcing them to join his pirate crew.

11.title: Ballistamon's Bad News Blast from the Past!
11.plot: With Baillistamon's evil form, Dark Volumon, revealed and Nene and Mikey kidnapped by Olegmon, Shoutmon must team up with Christopher and Team Blue Flare to save their friends and return Ballistamon to his true self.

12.title: Deep Trouble in Canyon Land!
12.plot: Christopher's competitive nature gets the better of him when he insists on defeating the Dark General of Canyon Land by himself, with disastrous results.

13.title: Great Fusion! The Power of Friendship
13.plot: The Fusion Fighters are left reeling when they are betrayed by Christopher, who is determined to prove his strength by defeating Mikey and Shoutmon once and for all.

14.title: Regeneration Frustration!
14.plot: The Fusion Fighters pour their energy into the fight against Dark General Gravimon, who in addition to his fearsome army and ability to re-constitute his body, has set his sights on taking the power of X7 for himself.

15.title: Dark Side of the Sun
15.plot: The Fusion Fighters are divided on whether or not they can trust Apollomon, the Dark General of Bright Land, who claims he is secretly on their side and needs their help to defeat Lord Bagra.

16.title: The Dark Side of Bright Land
16.plot: Trapped in a nightmare of a place called the Underworld, Mikey and his friends are challenged to a final battle by Ewan, who intends to annihilate the Fusion Fighters.

17.title: The Battle of the Young Generals
17.plot: While Christopher, Nene and the other Fusion Fighters battle Apollomon Whispered and his evil comrades, it's up to Mikey to convince Ewan that the Digital World isn't a game and that losing has real world consequences.

18.title: Beelzemon's Revenge
18.plot: As Ewan finally comes to grips with the idea that the Digital World isn't a game, Mikey and the Fusion Fighters must find a way to escape the Underworld before they are trapped there forever.

19.title: The Darkest Dark General of All!
19.plot: As the dark side of Apollomon, Apollomon Whispered, grows stronger, Mikey must come to terms with the fact that his ally may be lost to him forever. With a new sense of teamwork and dedication to each other, the Fusion Fighters regroup in order to try and defeat the last Dark General.

20.title: Prison Land
20.plot: With all seven Dark Generals destroyed, the Fusion Fighters finally arrive at Lord Bagra's castle. There, they come face to face with AxeKnightmon and all seven of the Dark Generals, regenerated to fight against them!

21.title: Rotten to the Digi-Core!
21.plot: In an attempt to save his friends, Mikey allows Axeknightmon to extract his Digi-Core and is sent to the dreaded Holding Cell of Prison Land. There, he comes face to face with the cores of the seven Dark Generals, who are only too happy to band together and defeat the Fusion Fighter General.

22.title: D5 and the Brotherhood of Evil
22.plot: After escaping Prison Land, Mikey and the Fusion Fighters finally come face to face with Lord Bagra. But when he personally absorbs the Dark Code Crown, he becomes stronger than they ever could have imagined, and set to take over not only the Digital World but the Human World as well!

23.title: The Darkness Before the Dawn
23.plot: After witnessing Axeknightmon's treachery, the Fusion Fighters fear all hope is lost as they battle the newly fused and immensely powerful Darkest Axeknightmon and receive some unexpected help from a pair of old friends.

24.title: Final Fusion - The Fight for Earth!
24.plot: With both the Human and the Digital Worlds invaded by MegaDarkness Bagramon, the Fusion Fighters have one last hope - the Order of the Knights! With their help, Mikey sets on a desperate mission to save Shoutmon, while both good and evil Digimon clash in one last epic battle for the future of both worlds.

1.title: Mikey Goes to Another World
1.plot: Mikey, an upbeat seventh grader who can't resist helping people in trouble, encounters a Digimon named Shoutmon who brings him to the Digital world.

2.title: He Is Shoutmon, Hear Him Roar!
2.plot: Shoutmon holds a banquet in a desperate attempt to keep Mikey from leaving the Digital World. The evil Bagra Army attacks and Shoutmon is at a disadvantage, until Mikey helps him combine with his Digi-friends using Digi-Fusion.

3.title: A Rival Appears
3.plot: Mikey, Angie and Jeremy have become allies with Shoutmon and his fellow Digimon. Still trying to defeat the Bagra Empire, they meet Christopher and Nene, two other humans living in the digital world. Will Christopher and Nene help Mikey? Or do they have plans of their own?

4.title: Island Zone in Chaos!
4.plot: With proof that controlling a Code Crown makes you the ruler of that zone, Mikey and Team Fusion Heart go in search for the Island Zone's Code Crown in order to protect it from the Bagra Forces.

5.title: Thanks for the Digicards
5.plot: Evil Neptunemon learns the Code Crown is inside Whamon's belly, so he drops a mixture of DigiByte snacks and bombs from the air to weaken the gigantic Digimon. But Shoutmon wards off the bombs with no regard for his own safety.

6.title: Crisis or Conquest
6.plot: When Mikey's team is surrounded by Seadramons on the island, Christopher shows up and offers to help in exchange for the Digi-Memory Card.

7.title: Danger Erupts
7.plot: Local Digimon have been rounded up by AncientVolcanomon in an attempt to excavate the Code Crown at the ruins where the Bagra base is located. Just as Mikey's team tries to rescue the Digimon from prison, the enemy discovers them.

8.title: Meltdown in the Magma Zone
8.plot: Mikey and Team Fusion Heart allow themselves to be captured by AncientVolcanomon so they can learn where the Digimon prisons are located. Meanwhile, Bagra Empire Head Officer Tactimon reveals that Dorulumon has acted as his right hand in overthrowing numerous zones in the past.

9.title: Dorulumon's True Colors!
9.plot: While Mikey and Dorulumon await their fate in a cell, Christopher shows up to fight Tactimon just in time. When a past friend of Dorulumon remembers he owes him one, he lets them run free.

10.title: The Rival Champions!
10.plot: Mikey goes to the Lake Zone and saves Knightmon from the bottom of an icy lake. Meanwhile, the Bagra forces led by IceDevimon attack the castle under orders from Laylamon. Christopher and crew arrive and fight alongside Mikey.

11.title: Ice to See You, Angie!
11.plot: Since Mikey is too exhausted to battle, the Fusion Fighters band together under Jeremy's leadership. Angie becomes concerned when she hears Beastmon talking in her sleep about how both the Digital World and the human world are facing a crisis.

12.title: Treasure, Traps, and Trouble - Oh, My!
12.plot: While looking for treasure in the Sand Zone, Team Fusion Heart ends up falling into an underground Bagra Base. Pharoahmon and Deputymon test Mikey's team to see if they are worthy of the Code Crown.

13.title: Mikey, Warrior of the Light!
13.plot: When Reapmon observes the goddess statue emit light to Mikey, he recalls his past with the Warriors of the Goddess who were tragically destroyed. Meanwhile, Laylamon brings along Ebemon and attacks the Fusion Fighters.

14.title: Showdown in the Sand Zone
14.plot: Mikey and the Fusion Fighters are surrounded by the enemy while Reapmon takes part in a healing ritual. When Reapmon sacrifices his own self for the rest of the team, he is reborn as Beelzemon.

15.title: Trouble in Paradise
15.plot: Mikey and friends are forced to the Sky Zone where the police presence is so strong the Bagra Empire can't touch it. Visiting the Art Gallery, the Fusion Fighters and their new friend, Lucemon are charged with crimes they didn't commit and ultimately arrested and taken to the deletion site!

16.title: A Dark Cloud Over the Sky Zone
16.plot: Lucemon wins the support of the zone's Digimon and becomes the new president. After his election he reveals his hidden wicked nature. ShoutmonX4B gets the better of him as he tries to deliver the Code Crown to Laylamon.

17.title: Clash in the Clouds
17.plot: Mikey asks Sparrowmon to work with him to save Nene. Sparrowmon then tries to get DarkKnightmon to help them, but DarkKnightmon is more interested in increasing the power of darkness in Lucemon's vicinity.

18.title: Welcome to the Jungle Zone!
18.plot: Mickey and Shoutmon are separated from Angie and Jeremy as they enter the Jungle Zone. As Jeremy and Angie hide in a temple, Dorulumon returns to Mikey while Tactimon leads Bagra forces to close in on Mikey and Shoutmon.

19.title: Rumble in the Jungle Zone!
19.plot: The Fusion Fighters follow AxeKnightmon and Nene into the jungle's sacred zone in search of the mighty Digimon Deckerdramon. Mikey finds out that Nene is under AxeKnightmon's control for the sake of her younger brother. Now Mikey needs to find a way to help Nene!

20.title: Train of Terror
20.plot: Mikey reunites with the Fusion Fighters in the Dust Zone after getting abducted and released by AxeKnightmon. But ToyAgumon's gang shows up and steals the Fusion Loader. Shoutmon and crew have a hard time fighting back against GrandLocomon's merciless attack, but they combine forces with the local Digimon and manage to take back the Fusion Loader.

21.title: Disaster in the Dust Zone!
21.plot: Mikey's team goes to rescue Nene from prison, but a mind-controlled Christopher stands in their way. Meanwhile, the team is still in search for the Code Crown.

22.title: Lost in Digital Space
22.plot: Mikey's stuck between zones, until he's picked up by Wisemon, a researcher who wants to learn everything about the Digital World. Mikey learns that the digital world existed since the ancient past and the human section is just a small portion. Meanwhile, Arukadhimon catches the Fusion Fighters.

23.title: Laughing All the Way to the Code Crown!
23.plot: Mikey's team comes to the Shinobi Zone, where it's under attack by Bagra forces led by Musyamon, who has captured the Monitamons' castle and princess. There they learn from Monitamon elder that in order to get the Code Crown, they'll have to make its owner, Karatenmon, laugh.

24.title: Monitamission Impossible
24.plot: Mikey's team defends the Monitamon village and works to rescue the Princess. When Musyamon has Jeremy in a tight spot, the unconfident Monitamons and Nene come to help him. Seeing how the members care for each other, Nene again tells Mikey that she wants to be part of the Fusion Fighters.

25.title: Showdown in Shaky Town! A Zone Collapses!
25.plot: When Mikey's team comes to the Disc Zone, they discover Christopher is fighting Blastmon in an effort to hang on to the Code Crown. Mikey tries to help him in order to keep the fighting from collapsing the zone, but the ground caves in and the main attackers from both teams fall to the zone's lowest level.

26.title: Shoutmon: Bogus King or The Real Thing?
26.plot: When Mikey is able to return the Fusion Fighters and the residents of the Disc Zone to the Shinobi Zone, Shoutmon questions his ability to keep being the core of all these Digi-Fusions.

27.title: Sweet Zone Bake-Off!
27.plot: Team Fusion Heart works together in a bake-off against WaruMonzaemon to rescue the chefs of the Sweet Zone. Cutemon learns from the rescued pastry chef Digimon that his parents were among the captive Digimon.

28.title: Battle in the Digital Depths
28.plot: Mikey's team slips and falls into the town's underground, where they are attacked by Raremons, but manage to escape and search for the town's captive Digimon and Cutemon's parents.

29.title: Fall of the Final Code Crown
29.plot: Mikey's team comes to the Sword Zone and is attacked by the Bagra Army swordsman led by Grademon.

30.title: When Worlds Collide
30.plot: Mikey, Jeremy, Angie and Shoutmon are back home. Meanwhile, Tactimon has ended up in the human world too, and he revives himself by absorbing digital energy. Now Mikey, Jeremy and Angie must decide if they should head back to the Digital world.

imdb.plot outline: Mikey Kudo, a 7th grade boy, heard a mysterious melody and followed it to an alley where a mysterious, legendary Digivice called the Fusion Loader appeared in front of him. Accompanied by his friends, Angie Hinomoto and Jeremy Tsurugi, they were dragged into the Digital World. They soon realized that the Digital World was a place inhabited by living creatures named Digimon and is now slowly being taken over by an evil empire named the Bagra Army. Now, Mikey and his "Fusion Fighters" team become an important figure to free the world from the Bagra Army, led by their Emperor Lord Bagra.
imdb.title: Digimon Fusion
plot: Three kids get transported to the Digital World where they must save its specific zones with the help of Shoutmon, an energetic digimon inhabiting the world.::dumbidoom

Mikey Kudo, a 7th grade boy, heard a mysterious melody and followed it to an alley where a mysterious, legendary Digivice called the Fusion Loader appeared in front of him. Accompanied by his friends, Angie Hinomoto and Jeremy Tsurugi, they were dragged into the Digital World. They soon realized that the Digital World was a place inhabited by living creatures named Digimon and is now slowly being taken over by an evil empire named the Bagra Army. Now, Mikey and his "Fusion Fighters" team become an important figure to free the world from the Bagra Army, led by their Emperor Lord Bagra.::Praveen Daniel
